```{r}
library(tidyverse)



iris_scatterplot <- ggplot(iris, aes(x=Petal.Length, y=Petal.Width)) +
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap( ~Species)+
  labs(x = "Petal Length", y = "Petal Width", title = "Iris Petal Length Verus Width By Species")


iris_scatterplot
```
